testcase.name: sqlTest

error.message: Error creating bean with name 'sqlSessionFactory' defined in class path resource [spring/applicationContext-dao.xml]: Initialization of bean failed; nested exception is org.springframework.beans.TypeMismatchException: Failed to convert property value of type 'java.lang.String' to required type 'org.springframework.core.io.Resource[]' for property 'mapperLocations'; nested exception is java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Could not resolve resource location pattern [classpath:mapper/*.xml]: class path resource [mapper/] cannot be resolved to URL because it does not exist
